format: A data frame with 534 observations on the following variables.
reference:
Data are from 1985.
The data file is recoded from the original, which had
entirely numerical codes.
title: Data from the 1985 Current Population Survey (CPS85)
description:
Description
The Current Population Survey (CPS) is used to supplement census
information between census years. These data consist of a random
sample of persons from the CPS85, with information on wages and
other characteristics of the workers, including sex, number of years
of education, years of work experience, occupational status, region of
residence and union membership.

parameters.married: a factor with levels Married Single
parameters.union: a factor with levels Not Union
parameters.hispanic: a factor with levels Hisp NH
parameters.exper:
number of years of work experience (inferred from age and
educ)
parameters.sex: a factor with levels F M
parameters.sector:
a factor with levels clerical const
manag manuf other prof sales service
parameters.south: a factor with levels NS S
parameters.race: a factor with levels NW (nonwhite) or W (white)
